author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chief Minister N. Rangasamy laid the foundation stone for the Pondicherry Technological University at the campus of Pondicherry Engineering College on Friday. Pondicherry Engineering College is the only institution in the region recommended to be upgraded as Pondicherry Technological University under the ‘Rashtriya Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan’ (RUSA) Plan by the Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD) in September 2015.

As Pondicherry Engineering College has fulfilled all the required norms, the Technical Support Group of RUSA (TSG) recommended for funding. Further, the Project Approval Board of RUSA has approved a fund of Rs. 55 crore towards this proposal.
title: Foundation laid for university
